Articles.Content:
With the forum threads lost I'm not sure where else to post to get information.

I'm looking to find out if Carmics has been around in a while, and if AIES is "dead" or if anyone has a working link / MM configs to make it work in 1.2 ?

 

Thanks in advance!!

I'm working on MM patches for AIES at the moment, I can release them sometime this week once I'm satisfied they work properly.

Carmics has apparently not been on this forum for over six months so I doubt an update will becoming out soon, if at all.

Edited February 28, 2017 by Tapejara
